title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Latvia 2006 to 2018
summary: Approximately 28.7 million arrivals were recorded at travel accommodation in greece in 2018. International tourism was the highest contributor , with around two thirds of arrivals in visitor accommodation coming from a foreign country . greece tourism growth Since 2009 international visitor numbers to greece have steadily increased . Including both overnight and same-day visitors , figures reached over 30 million by 2017 .
gold: This statistic shows the number of tourist arrivals at accommodation establishments in Latvia from 2006 to 2018 . Since 2009 there has been an increasing trend in arrivals . In 2018 , the number of arrivals ( including both foreign and domestic ) at accommodation in Latvia amounted to approximately 2.8 million .
